Title: Varzok
Description:
Lok'tar, $n. My name is Varzok. I have heard much your accomplishments as a tamer recently, and I would like to introduce you to trainers around Azeroth so that you may further hone your skills.

Please speak with me in Orgrimmar so that we may begin.
PortraitGiverText: I look forward to meeting you.
RewardText:
You must be $n. Well met. I am Varzok.

I will serve as your contact from here on out.
